headline: Block Processes 124 Million Transactions as Americans Shop Local This Black Friday, Cyber Monday
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/SAN FRANCISCO, December 02, 2025--Block, Inc. (NYSE: XYZ) today released its Black Friday, Cyber Monday results, revealing a shift toward local spending as Americans focus on neighborhood economies. Data indicates Block handled more than 124 million transactions across Square, Cash App, and Afterpay over the four-day shopping period, reflecting a 10% increase from last year.

headline: CORRECTING and REPLACING Block Processes 124 Million Transactions as Americans Shop Local This Black Friday, Cyber Monday
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/SAN FRANCISCO, December 02, 2025--In Lower West Side, Chicago section, first bullet point should read: Total BFCM Weekend Volume: $8.4M (instead of Total BFCM Weekend Volume: $49M).
